tool_description: Calculates comprehensive costs for inventory transfers including shipping, handling, insurance, and operational expenses with detailed breakdowns.

declared_value.description: Total declared value of transferred inventory

handling_fee_override.description: Custom handling fee to override standard rates

volume_discount_eligible.description: Whether shipment qualifies for volume discounts

error_messages: Invalid service type: Must be 'standard', 'expedited', or 'overnight'.
Carrier not supported: The specified carrier_name is not available for this route.
Invalid weight: total_weight_kg must be greater than 0.
Invalid declared value: declared_value must be positive.
Fuel surcharge out of range: fuel_surcharge_rate must be between 0 and 50.
Handling fee error: handling_fee_override must be non-negative if provided.
usage: Provide transfer details including locations, carrier, service type, weight, and declared value. Enable include_insurance for valuable shipments. Use handling_fee_override for custom pricing and volume_discount_eligible for bulk transfers.

base_shipping_cost.description: Base shipping cost before additional fees

total_transfer_cost.description: Final total cost for the transfer

cost_per_kg.description: Cost per kilogram for this transfer
